name: Snake Blaster
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34

Battle your friend in this 1v1 classic mix of Astroid and Snake. Pick up items to grow your tail of weapons. Use those items to attack your opponent. Aim at their head to cause damage or sabotage them by shooting at their tail to destroy their ammo. The art style is based on early video games like Asteroid.

THEME : Growing
ENGINE : Unity
ART : Pixen
SOUND : www.bfxr.net

ITEMS
-empty circles : normal bullets
-cross : heals 1 HP
-circle inside circle : land mine (active mines are gray)
-double lines : double bullet
-bomb shape : bomb (explodes on impact)
-You can hold a maximum of 6 items

CONTROLS
Player 1 (starts on right)
-arrow keys to move
-space to use item

Player 2 (starts on left)
-wasd keys to move
-f to use item
